casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Earl BRADLEY. No. 21P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 13, 2006. Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bradley. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of January 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of January 2006."
